channel.title: Client Run error Could not find or load main class client ( Still not been fixed
channel.description:
Error: Could not find or load main class client Press any key to continue . . .
Here's my run.bat
[code]@echo off title Runescape 317 - 667 cd bin java client 10 0 highmem members 32 pause[/code]
My client.class\java in my bin [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2vnna77.png[/img]

hi im bamf:

Thank you so much, worked liked a charm.

You’re very welcome.
